About me

Hi, I'm Nasrah a front-end developer based in london. Recently completed studying web design and developement, I had the opportunity to work on projects using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Jquery, PHP, MySQL, web data using XML, JSON and AJAX.
I use node.js and webpack 4 to build projects, along with utilising javascript libraries like GSAP, Scrollmagic and three.js to create beautiful, accessible, responsive and dynamic websites.
